DOC.brief_summary: Background : - The immune system contain several different type cell blood part body . The body fight infection well right balance cell type . The wrong balance cell type may cause disease , allergy asthma . The COX-2 gene may help decide balance cell type body make part immune system . It may also play role certain immune system disease . Researchers want see COX-2 affect cell immune system . Objectives : - To study COX-2 gene work body immune system . Eligibility : - Individuals 18 year age part Environmental Polymorphisms Registry . Design : - Participants one study visit National Institutes Health . They collect urine sample home morning study visit . - Participants physical exam medical history . They provide blood sample . They also give researcher urine sample collect morning . - No treatment provide part study .
DOC.detailed_description: This cross-sectional , control study design investigate association single nucleotide polymorphism ( SNPs ) cyclooxygenase-2 ( COX2 ) gene , also call prostaglandin endoperoxidase synthase 2 ( PTGS2 ) , T-cell differentiation function . Specifically , impact promoter-region SNP 765G > C ( rs20417 ) 3 untranslated region ( UTR ) SNP 8473T > C ( rs5275 ) T helper cell ( Th ) 2 , Th9 , Th17 differentiation function examine . Non-Hispanic , White Black/African American , non-pregnant adult , age 18-65 year , wild type ( WT ) , respect 765G > C 8473T > C SNPs , WT respect 765G > C homozygous 8473T > C , homozygous 765G > C 8473T > C recruit total three genotype group . Potential participant identify Environmental Polymorphisms Registry , contact recruitment letter pre-screened eligibility . Pre-screened individual provide verbal consent withhold certadata analysis , urine collection cup , pre-visit instruction . Participants attend single study visit take place National Institute Environmental Health Sciences ( NIEHS ) Clinical Research Unit ( CRU ) . During visit , write informed consent obtain , final screening eligibility determination , medical history review , vital sign , physical examination blood urine sample collect . From peripheral blood , lymphocyte subset , prostaglandin level , cytokine level determine ; stable prostaglandin metabolite , creatinine , total protein albumin measure urine . Lymphocytes isolate peripheral blood ex vivo analysis . Demographic characteristic ( i.e. , age ) compare group , possible , recruitment target achieve approximate match race gender across group . The primary objective study determine whether 765G > C 8473T > C SNPs exhibit alter Th2 , Th9 Th17 cell differentiation examine lymphocyte subset vivo . The study also examine impact two SNPs circulate Th2/Th9/Th17 cytokine level prostaglandins vivo , differentiation naive CD4+T-cells Th cell subset vitro , lymphocyte production cytokine prostaglandins vitro .
DOC.criteria: INCLUSION CRITERIA : Participant Environmental Polymorphisms Registry current contact information available Genotype information available relevant 765G > C 8473T > C COX2 polymorphism , indicate : Individuals WT respect 765G > C 8473T > C ( N=31 ) Individuals WT respect 765G > C homozygous 8473T > C ( N=31 ) Individuals homozygous 765G > C 8473T > C ( N=31 ) Age 18 65 year Race selfidentified White Black NonHispanic ethnicity Willing able provide inform consent Able comply protocol procedure EXCLUSION CRITERIA : History infection within precede 1 week oral temperature > 38 degree C Current daily chronic use corticosteroid ( systemic , inhaled topical ) . Any current condition know impact peripheral white blood cell count ( e.g. , leukemia , lymphopenia , AIDS , immunodeficiency disorder ) Current daily chronic use systemic immunosuppressant . Current pregnancy lactation Unwilling unable : Fast ( include alcohol caffeinecontaining product ) discontinue tobacco use 12 hour prior study visit Withhold prescribe overthecounter medication supplement morning study visit , visit complete Refrain take follow medication supplement 7 day prior study visit : NSAIDs Corticosteroids ( nasal , inhale , topical systemic ) Fish oil niacin supplement For blood draw exceed 200ml , hematocrit < 34 % woman < 36 % men , > 56 % either gender . For blood draw exceed 200ml , blood plasma donation last 8 week
